alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 11:45PM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Clarke and Wilcox Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From late Sunday night until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to crest just above flood stage at 42.1 feet late Sunday night or Monday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
